description: This is a shattered fragment of alien resin.  It looks a bit like a large piece of sea glass, frosted and gritty with the edges rounded off.  It is somewhat warm to the touch.

This is a large pod, the size of a keg, filled with gooey alien resin.  Squeezing it firmly causes resin to squirt from the broken stalk at the end, hardening within a few seconds of being exposed to the air.
